勉.definition: to exhort; to make an effort

勉力.definition: to strive; to make an effort; to exert oneself

勉力而為.definition: to try one's best to do sth (idiom)

勉勉強強.definition: to achieve with difficulty; only just up to the task; barely adequate

勉強.definition: to do with difficulty; to force sb to do sth; reluctant; barely enough

勉為其難.definition: to tackle a difficult job (idiom); to do sth reluctantly

勉縣.definition: Mian County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi
